Docs.summary: Abstract class that describes input device gestures.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Implementations of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture> in Windows Presentation Foundation are <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
An input gesture can be associated with a command so that when the gesture is performed the command is invoked. For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> and the [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
